name: Cyber_Bully
description:
Cyber Bullying isn't what it used to be.

Kids these days don't know what it was like to deal with bullies in the arcades back in the 70's and 80's.

Get called names and have your money taken from you while you get beaten and shoved into the ground. No one does anything about it. Those were the good old days. They make you tough!
It's time to go back and get the real experience of what it was like to be a nerd who loved video games in a time where that love made you a target for...

Cyber Bullies

Your mum has "Things to do" so she's left you at the arcade with a pocket full of quarters. Kill time by playing video games and earning a high score. But be aware of where the bully is or he'll pound you into the ground and take your money. If you think he's near by... It might be better to abandon the game you're playing and live to fight another day!
